ee sakakaru kolambaa aparadha kottashaya wisin dina 3k pura radawagena prashna kirimen pasuwayi.ada sakakaru kolambaa pradhana mahesthrathwaraya wetha idiripath kirimen pasuwayi adhikaranaya mema niyogaya labadunne.

uthure pa්rashnaya salaka balathoth samayen eya wisadaganimata eltitieeyata kisidu wuwamanawak nowiya.

daduruoye saha kala oye jala mattama nawathath ihala yamata ida athi bawin ee awata padinchikaruwantada awadhanayen pasuwana lesa puththalama aapada kalamanakarana eekakaya illimak karayi.kurunagala saha mathale pradesha walata eeye dawasa pura wasi labima hethuwen daduruoye jala mattama ihala ya haki bawath,me wana witath rajanganaya jalashaye wan doratu 06 k adi 08 bagin wiwrutha kara athi nisa kala oye jala mattamath nawatha ihala ya haki bawath apada kalamanakarana eekakaya penwadeyi.kese wethath wishala mattame jala galimak apeksha kala nohaki wuwath pasugiya dinawala ganwathura tharjanayata muhuna dun aya wishesha awadhanayakin pasuwiya yuthu bawa puththalama aapada kalamanakarana eekakaya kiyayi.me athara pawathina ayahapath kalagunaya hethuwen pa්radesha kihipayaka pa්radhana margawala gamanagamanayatada badha ella wi thibe.
wadihitiyan sandaha adhyapana pahasukamsthapitha kirima menma
manda ema wedithabima siduwana wita janda pracharaka katayuthuwalata yamin siti hewath ‘kanwasin’ yamin siya gananak ehi siti bawata pasuwa wartha palawannata wiya.

me nisa pasugiya sathiye parlimenthuwe sammatha karannata thibu wat badu sanshodhana panatha hakula gannata aanduwata siduwiya.mema shreshtadhikaranaye thirana aanduwata ee tharam prasadayak nowu athara parlimenthuwedi agamathithuma wisin karana lada prakashayen eya pahadili we.
ese nam me nawa peraliya athi wuye kukule ganga wyapruthiyath samaga bawa dan pahadiliya.
anthimata lajjawen ee bawa piligena aththatama therum gath nisa kohoma hari in midenna uthsaha karana ayath ematayi.

mithurawa jesus wahanse wethata maga penwimatath ohuge jiwithaya bera ganimatath ema kithunuwata haki wiya.

rawi, api hithuwoth ehema "sasara pura" kiyala deyak thiyanawa kiyala mama kamathi me bhawaye mama danata therun gath dewal saha giya bhawa wala ekathu kara gath dewal nawatha aluth widihakin me ammayi thaththayi ekkama karala balanna, mokada mata hithenawa godak de manga harila kiyala...
onna me langaka di thun hithakawath nothibunaya kiwwata pandara jame awarita hinayak penana gannawa .

pahadiliwama.lamayakuge nidahasa ahimi karala anawashya barak lamayakuta patawenawa oya kaledi.sellam karannawath denne na.ude idala maha ra wenakam maha pidawak windinne.shishyathwa wibhage dawaswala gewal walin ellawena pidanaya hinda lamayi manasikawa ada watenawa.api punchi kale api shishyathwaya liwwe samanya wibhagayak liyana widiyatamayi.ohoma pidanayak thibune na.dan shishyathwa wibhage prathipala ena dawaswalata lamayi inne mara bayakin.ee tharam meka lamayinta pidanayak wela.demapiyo thamayi me warada karanna mul wenne.

‘ janadhipathiwaraya mathiwaranaya karanne ape podu janayage salli walin .eeth podu apekshaka maithripala sirisena mahatha thamage wiyadamin mathiwarana katayuthu sidu karanawa.ohuta raliyakata yannawath dadi aarakshawak na.eekama loku asadharanayak.kawuru dinuwath kamak na.mathiwaranaya sadharanawa samakamiwa pawathwanna kiyala mathiwarana komasaristhumagen illanawa.‘
meyata perada awastha gananawakadi wyawastha sampadanaya, uthure arbudaya wani thiranathmaka prashnawaladi ekala pawathi aandu wisin sarwa pakshika samulu kandawana ladi.

thawath ek minisek kuda yathrawa samaga winasha karamin kunatuwa pahawa yana ladi.pasuwa minisa diya suliye giluna bawa wartha wiya.[15]kunatuwa athara thura minisun 20 k pamana thuwala laba athi athara 60 kata pamana niwasa nathiwi 1000 k pamana eyata muhunadi atha.[17][18]mulu alabhahaniya oostreliyanu dolar miliyana 20 k (amarikanu dolar miliyana 16.8 k ) saha pilisakara kirim sadaha giya wiyadama oostreliyanu dolar miliyana 5 k (amarikanu dolar miliyana 4.1 k ) pamana wiya.[2][19]kunatuwe prabalathawaya anuwa "oorsan" yana nama labuni.[20]

sathwa gathi athi manushyaya thula da aththe me thriwidha sangnyawoma ya.eda sambuddhayan wahanse thaman wahansegema pragnyawen awabodha kota wadala uthum wu manushya dharmaya, anubudu mihindu himiyan wethin me rate janathawata dewanam piyathissa nirindun pramukhakota anuradhapura mihinthala ambasthala kandu mudunhi sita,samanamayan maharaja – dhammarajassa sawaka thamewa anukampaya – jambudipa idhagathayanuwen deshithawa wadama kota wadala heyinma api wasara 2556 likhitha ithihasayak athi shilachara shishta sampanna manushya jathiyak wemu ya.eheyinma arahath mihindu maha himiyo mehi wadiya yin pasu palamukota “pretha wasthu” deshanawa pawathwa pawata lajja ha biya athikota “sabba papassa akaranan” patipadawehi da, ha “wimanawasthu” wani deshana pawathwa “kusalassa upasampada” patipadawehi da ha “chullahaththipado pama – ananthalakkhana” wani suthra deshana pawathwa “sachiththa pariyodapanan” wani sekha patipadawehi da pihituwa siyalu buduwarayanan wahanselama desu me dahama prachalitha kota apa manushya dharmayehi pihituwanu labuwo ya.ewan wu dharmayaka dayada himi api prathipaththi dharmayehi pihitamin anagatha parapurata da me dharmaya rakshitha kota dena aarakshakayan bawata pathwemuya yana paniwidaya maithri karuna sahagatha sith peradari kota mese satahan kara thabami.
